cpa.games.board.oxo
Class OXOEngine

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--cpa.games.board.BoardEngine
        |
        +--cpa.games.board.oxo.OXOEngine
public class OXOEngine
extends BoardEngine

This class is the game engine for the OXO game.

getWinner

public OXOPlayer getWinner()
Returns the winner, if there is one.

Returns:
It returns blank in case of no winner, otherwise the symbol used.
